verses.verse: Unless Yahweh<WH3068> builds<WH1129> the house,<WH1004> they labor<WH5998> in vain<WH7723> who build<WH1129> it.<WH3068> Unless Yahweh watches<WH8104> over the city,<WH5892> the watchman<WH8104> guards<WH8245> it in vain.<WH7723>

It is vain<WH7723> for you to rise up<WH6965> early,<WH7925> to stay up<WH3427> late,<WH309> eating<WH398> the bread<WH3899> of toil;<WH6089> for he gives<WH5414> sleep<WH8142> to his loved ones.<WH3039>
Behold,<WH1121> children are a heritage<WH5159> of Yahweh.<WH3068> The fruit<WH6529> of the womb<WH990> is his reward.<WH7939>
As arrows<WH2671> in the hand<WH3027> of a mighty man,<WH1368> so are the children<WH1121> of youth.<WH5271>
Happy<WH835> is the man<WH1397> who has his quiver<WH827> full<WH4390> of them.<WH954> They won't be disappointed when they speak<WH1696> with their enemies<WH341> in the gate.<WH8179>
